Title: silverstripe/framework has Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in page history comparison
Description: Authenticated user with page edit permission can craft HTML, which when rendered in a page history comparison can execute client scripts.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.4.0-rc1 before 3.4.6, all versions starting from 3.5.0-rc1 before 3.5.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.4.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.4.6 before 3.5.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.4
